QuestData.Title: The Butcher of Bladespire
QuestData.Description: After Ga'nar advanced into the fortress, the Bladespire unleashed a giant creature on our forces.$b$bI am still weak after using my magic, but at least I can help this orc in her recovery.$b$bHelp take Dorogg down, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: This room shook when the monster fell. Your deeds shall not go unremembered.
